short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud-based Applicant Tracking System - One platform to manage your human resources and customers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Source top talent data directly from your favorite job board - Naukri.

Vultus Recruit, the evolving Applicant Tracking System simplifies, streamlines and speeds up your recruitment process with the new Naukri integration.

The Vultus Google Chrome Extension allows users to add candidates to your database directly from the Naukri website or application.

How does this Vultus Integration with Naukri work?
- Install the VULTUS RECRUIT Plugin
- Click the Vultus icon displayed on your Naukri profile
- Add potential candidates to your Vultus database within a single click.
